# How to use trunk with Rails

= Introduction =

If you want to try ActiveLdap on the edge with your Rails application, the following instructionis will help you.

= Details =

{{{
% rails sample
% cd sample
% script/plugin install http://ruby-activeldap.googlecode.com/svn/trunk
% mv vendor/plugins/{trunk,active_ldap}
% cd vendor/plugins/active_ldap
% ln -s rails/plugin/active_ldap/init.rb ./
}}}
